comments.body: Site doesn't work. There is a problem with the certificate. How can you buy one if you can't even look at it? Before you sell it, you should fix the bugs, and then put it up for sale. And so, to buy a pig in a poke...

comments.author: NextLevelSystems
comments.body: Thanks for the reply! Should be fixed now.
